column5: Will be heading out to lake Niapenco today to do some canoe fishing, anyone ever fished there ? If so whats it like ? Will post report later today

I was there for the derby, jigging by the dam can be good if the weather is calm, otherwise head into the small back bays with jerk baits for bass and slip bobbers for crappie. Ask the staff what is working, dont eat anything you catch and good luck!
Thanks , yeah just catch and release with those fish eh ! Too bad it wrecked a good lake
